mapper.select: SELECT A.CON_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.CON_WRITE_DATE , A.CON_HTITLE , A.CON_HANDLE FROM TB_CONSULTANT A JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE A.CON_HDELETE = 'N' ORDER BY A.CON_NO DESC

SELECT A.CON_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.CON_WRITE_DATE , A.CON_HDATE , A.CON_HTIME , A.CON_HTITLE , A.CON_HCONTENT , A.CON_HUPDATE FROM TB_CONSULTANT A JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE A.CON_HDELETE = 'N' AND A.CON_NO = #{ no }

SELECT A.CON_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.CON_HTITLE , A.CON_DATE , A.CON_IMP , A.CON_CONTENT FROM TB_CONSULTANT A JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE CON_DELETE = 'N' ORDER BY A.CON_NO DESC

SELECT A.CON_NO , A.CON_HCONTENT , A.CON_DATE , A.CON_TYPE , A.CON_WAY , A.CON_IMP , A.CON_CONTENT , A.CON_UPDATE , B.MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_CONSULTANT A JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE CON_DELETE = 'N' AND CON_NO = #{ no }
